p: First, expression of only 1% of genes (160 and 146 genes in abdomens and thoraces, respectively) was significantly affected (FDR < 0.05) by the interaction between seasonal environment and family, i.e., by a genotype-by-environment interaction (GxE; see Supplementary Data 3 for a list of all GxE genes). In contrast, genetic background (i.e., family) significantly affected average expression for 66% and 42% of genes in abdomen and thorax, respectively (Fig. 3a, b; Supplementary Fig. 1). Using alternative filtering and mapping approaches or applying an additional fold change >2 threshold yielded very similar results (Supplementary Notes; Supplementary Figs. 2– 4; Supplementary Table 1).
